name: mediabunny-umd
description: UMD bundle wrapper for mediabunny with a no-bundler browser demo

scripts.prepare:public: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && sed 's#../dist/mediabunny.umd.js#./mediabunny.umd.js#' demo/index.html > public/index.html && cp dist/mediabunny.umd.js public/mediabunny.umd.js && cp demo/remux.worker.js public/remux.worker.js
